org.cloudbus.cloudsim.container.core

Class ContainerVm

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.container.core.ContainerVm
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PowerContainerVm

    public class ContainerVm
extends Object
    Vm represents a VM: it runs inside a Host, sharing hostList with other VMs. It processes containers. This processing happens according to a policy, defined by the containerscheduler. Each VM has a owner, which can submit containers to the VM to be executed
    Since:
    CloudSim Toolkit 1.0

    Created by sareh on 9/07/15.

    Author:
    Rodrigo N. Calheiros, Anton Beloglazov, Sareh Fotuhi Piraghaj

    • Method Detail

      • updateVmProcessing

        public double updateVmProcessing(double currentTime,
                                 List<Double> mipsShare)
        Updates the processing of containers running on this VM.
        Parameters:
        currentTime - current simulation time
        mipsShare - array with MIPS share of each Pe available to the scheduler
        Returns:
        time predicted completion time of the earliest finishing cloudlet, or 0 if there is no next events
        Precondition:
        currentTime >= 0
        Postcondition:
        $none

      • setFailed

        public boolean setFailed(String resName,
                         boolean failed)
        Sets the PEs of this machine to a FAILED status. NOTE: resName is used for debugging purposes, which is ON by default. Use setFailed(boolean) if you do not want this information.
        Parameters:
        resName - the name of the resource
        failed - the failed
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise

      • setFailed

        public boolean setFailed(boolean failed)
        Sets the PEs of this machine to a FAILED status.
        Parameters:
        failed - the failed
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise

      • setPeStatus

        public boolean setPeStatus(int peId,
                           int status)
        Sets the particular Pe status on this Machine.
        Parameters:
        peId - the pe id
        status - Pe status, either Pe.FREE or Pe.BUSY
        Returns:
        true if the Pe status has changed, false otherwise (Pe id might not be exist)
        Precondition:
        peID >= 0
        Postcondition:
        $none
